Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the department of education to provide data regarding the provision of arts instructional requirements.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to provide data regarding the provision of arts instructional requirements.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to distribute information on college savings plans to all students.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to distribute information on college savings plans to all students.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Education Department, the New York State Legislature, and the Governor to re-examine public school accountability systems and to develop a system based on multiple forms of assessment which do not require extensive standardized testing.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Re-examine public school accountability systems and to develop a system based on multiple forms of assessment which do not require extensive standardized testing.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to requiring the department of education to provide data regarding the provision of arts instructional requirements.

Items.MatterName: Requiring the department of education to provide data regarding the provision of arts instructional requirements.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to distribute information on college savings plans to all students.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of education to distribute information on college savings plans to all students.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Education Department, the New York State Legislature, and the Governor to re-examine public school accountability systems and to develop a system based on multiple forms of assessment which do not require extensive standardized testing.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Re-examine public school accountability systems and to develop a system based on multiple forms of assessment which do not require extensive standardized testing.
